name: Hoito (Inside Goods & Co.)
text:
Hoito Restaurant Menu
PANCAKES
1 Pancake, 1 egg, 1 sausage or bacon $8 2 Pancakes, 2 eggs, 2 sausage or bacon $15 3 Pancakes, 3 eggs, 3 sausage or bacon $21 Add real maple syrup: $1
EGGS
1 Egg, 1 sausage or bacon, home fries, toast $8 2 Eggs, 2 sausage or bacon, home fries, toast $14 3 Eggs, 3 sausage or bacon, home fries, toast $17
TRADITIONAL FAVOURITES
Mojakka Finnish North American Beef Soup Small $8 Large $11
Salt Fish Sandwich $5 Salt-cured salmon served open-faced on rye bread
Karjalanpiirakka $6 (Karelian ‘Pies’) Traditional rye pastry with rice filling
Add Tomato $1 Cheese $2 Munavoi $3 (egg and butter spread)
SIDES
Pancake (1) $4 Bacon or sausage (1) $2 Home fries $5 Egg $2.50 Toast (2) $3
SOUP
Small $7 Large $9
BEVERAGES
Orange or Apple Juice Box $1.50 Coffee/tea $2.65 ea Water $1
221 RED RIVER RD. THUNDER BAY, ON www.hoito.ca
HOITO RESTAURANT LTD. ESTABLISHED 1918
HAVE A NICE DAY! THANK YOU! KIITOS!!
